file_content.text: Enough!
Conjure a hundred more holocrons, an arsenal of superweapons...
Nothing will stop me.
You're wrong, Valkorion... "Kneel before the dragon of Zakuul."
No... that only works against Vaylin.
I control what happens here--and I say what's good for Vaylin is good for you.
My mind, my rules.
Clever.
You've spent a hundred lifetimes putting people in cages. Here's yours.
How does it feel?
Impossible.
Look at your father, Vaylin. Trapped in the cage he built for you.
He's all yours, Vaylin.
Kneel, Father. Kneel before the dragon of Zakuul!
There is no escape.
It's over. Let go.
Senya.
You've turned your back on this family for the last time.
I am the Immortal Emperor. You cannot defeat me.
Sooner or later, death was always going to catch up with you.
Nothing lasts forever.
The end's almost here. What do you have to say for yourself?
Any last words?
Look at us. One big happy family, united by our hatred of one man...
We've come to destroy you.
Husband.
Father.
Monster.
Give your family the freedom they deserve.
Say goodbye to your family.
A god has no family.
Before I graced you with my presence, you were nothing but motes of filth, drowning in the chaos of the void.
And you, a lone Jedi, hounding me without aim or purpose.
And you, a lone Jedi, attempting to cure the galaxy of my influence.
And you, a lowly soldier, blindly serving the corrupt Republic.
And you, a lowly smuggler, taking jobs from the highest bidder.
And you, a lone Sith, betrayed by your master and left for dead.
I gave you a second life, anointed you my Wrath, forged into a being worthy of the Eternal Throne. Without me, you are nothing.
I am not your Wrath, Valkorion. I am your executioner.
I don't serve you any more.
And you, a lone Sith, bloated with power.
And you, a hired gun, hunting prey for profit.
And you, a pawn of the Sith Empire, chasing hollow conspiracies.
I forged you into a being worthy of the Eternal Throne. Without me, you are nothing.
Wrong again, Valkorion. It's you who needed me. Now you're alone, and nothing can save you from the fate you deserve.
It's you who are nothing.
Remember me when your Alliance burns to ash.
Whatever helps you sleep at night, old man.
Keep telling yourself that.
Enough. End this.
Thus ends the reign of the Immortal Emperor.
[Destroy the Immortal Emperor]
Be gone, Valkorion.
The pain only feels like it lasts an eternity.
Ha! How does it feel to be erased from the galaxy?
Farewell, Valkorion.
Go. Join my brother.
Ha! How does it feel to be erased from the galaxy?
Aaaaaargh!
Vaylin...
You did it.
You defeated Valkorion, once and for all.
The Immortal Emperor may be gone, but he left the galaxy in shambles. It's time to clean up his mess.
Now the healing can begin.
With the fleet at your disposal, you can lead the galaxy into a new era of prosperity. If that's what you truly desire.
Valkorion's risen from the grave more times than I can count. Are we sure he won't return again?
Is he truly gone?
For the first time in my life, I can't feel his presence. We will never see him again. I'm sure of it.
This calls for a celebration. But first, speeches.
No more nightmares. No more interruptions from a crusty, old ghost. I can get used to this.
Good riddance.
At last, we can enjoy a moment of privacy.
First speeches. Then pillow talk.
We can finally enjoy some alone time without Valkorion whispering in your ear.
But first, a speech.
You deserve a little peace and quiet.
But first: speeches.
I've opened a system-wide holochannel. The galaxy's ready to meet the new emperor.
I've opened a system-wide holochannel. The galaxy's ready to meet the new empress.
It's over.
You defeated Valkorion, once and for all.
The Immortal Emperor may be gone, but he left the galaxy in shambles. It's time to clean up his mess.
Now the healing can begin.
The galaxy needs a leader if it ever hopes to fully recover.
Valkorion's risen from the grave more times than I can count. Are we sure he won't return again?
Is he truly gone?
I no longer feel my father's presence. We will never see him again.
Now we can look to the future.
No more nightmares. No more interruptions from a crusty ghost. I can get used to this.
Good riddance.
We all can.
I've opened a system-wide holochannel. The galaxy's ready to meet the new emperor.
I'm no emperor.
[Heal the galaxy as peacekeeper]
[Rule the galaxy as emperor]
I've opened a system-wide holochannel. The galaxy's ready to meet the new empress.
I'm no empress.
[Heal the galaxy as peacekeeper]
People of the galaxy. The war is over. The Eternal Fleet is pacified.
Today marks the end of the Eternal Empire. The people of Zakuul are now free to rule themselves.
I will transform the throne into a beacon of peace--dedicated to helping Zakuul recover from a war that nearly destroyed us all.
We faced the full might of the Eternal Fleet. Watched cities fall. Friends die. We have suffered for the last time...
The Eternal Fleet will now serve as a benevolent armada--delivering supplies, transporting refugees, and healing the damage this war inflicted.
We must now look forward: beyond our homes, to the stars that surround us.
This will be our new frontier, as we work together to rebuild the galaxy. By trusting in each other, we begin a new era in galactic history.
The age of the Eternal Alliance.
[Rule the galaxy as empress]
They will bow to me before the day's over.
People of the galaxy. The Eternal Empire has been crushed. Its fleet now answers to me.
From this day forward, Zakuul will surrender to Alliance control--and no one will speak the name Valkorion ever again.
You suffered the Eternal Fleet's rage. Watched cities fall. Friends die. In time, these wounds will heal...
But the fleet is now mine. You must never forget its strength--and the fate that awaits anyone who challenges me.
I am your emperor. Conqueror of Zakuul and destroyer of the Eternal Empire. Under my rule, we begin a new era in galactic history.
I am your empress. Conqueror of Zakuul and destroyer of the Eternal Empire. Under my rule, we begin a new era in galactic history.
The age of the Eternal Alliance!
Father.
You're missing the party.
Funny. I thought you passed out on the dance floor.
I got a second wind.
Let me guess. You saw the Intelligence reports.
The Republic's preparing for war.
And the Sith Empire's not far behind.
So much for our friendly pact with Acina.
The Eternal Alliance is only hours old, but already I sense dark forces massing against us. Uprisings sparking across the galaxy...
We will defeat them.
Tomorrow. Tonight, we celebrate.
